titles.title: Colorado Wilderness Act of 2002
To designate certain lands in the State of Colorado as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: 4/17/2002--Introduced. Colorado Wilderness Act of 2002 - Designates specified lands in Colorado as wilderness and as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System. Provides for the reservation and protection of U.S. water rights for such areas.
